nftJet.title: üöÄ What is NFT JET?
nftJet.description: NFT marketplace operating on The Open Network blockchain. To start using the site, simply log in with your wallet - and that's it. Buy and sell NFTs, upload collections and NFTs to the blockchain, or just admire the creativity of artists and meet members of our community. Too many new unfamiliar words? We have collected answers to all questions about blockchain and NFTs in our FAQ.

ton.title: üíé What is Ethereum (ETH)?
ton.description: Ethereum (ETH) is a decentralized blockchain platform created to simplify interaction with digital assets and smart contracts. If you are an NFT artist or collector, Ethereum is the perfect tool due to its reliable infrastructure and active community. Ethereum is also transitioning to a more energy-efficient mechanism, Proof of Stake (PoS). Ethereum was developed by Vitalik Buterin and a team of programmers. The project is governed by the Ethereum Foundation, an independent organization supporting the network's development. The ecosystem uses its own cryptocurrency, Ether (ETH).

nft.title: üéá What is NFT (Non-fungible token)?
nft.description: NFT (Non-fungible token) is a unique token, a digital contract, a 'marker' indicating who owns a digital work and its creator. There are many practical applications for this technology. For example, artists create digital art and sell it. This is similar to buying stickers or virtual gifts online. Sometimes, authors give their creations additional practical value. Some NFTs act as tickets to exclusive clubs, some can be a resource or skin in a game, while others serve as documents proving ownership of something in the real world.

wallet.title: üëõ What is a crypto wallet?
wallet.description: Like in real life, a crypto wallet serves as a kind of familiar wallet: you can store your ETH and NFTs in it, and also use it for operations - receiving or sending ETH. In addition, wallets are used as a way to interact with projects on the blockchain. For example, to authenticate in Getgems, to mint, buy, and sell NFTs, you need to have a wallet. Don't worry, we don't have access to your coins, they are safe. There are many different wallets for ETH. We recommend using Metamask.

howBuy.title: üí∏ How to buy $ETH?
howBuy.description: You can buy Ethereum coins ($ETH) with a bank card inside MetaMask wallet using Wyre and Transak services. All purchase methods are collected on the official Ethereum website.

questions.title: üëÄ Have questions?
questions.description: You can contact us in support, which is located in the chat on our website.

aboutOurService.title: About our service
aboutOurService.description: NFT JET is a trading platform for non-replaceable tokens (NFT). Buy, sell and discover exclusive digital items.

footer.description: NFT JET is a trading platform for non-fungible tokens (NFTs). Buy, sell, and discover exclusive digital items for yourself.

layout.title: NFT JET
layout.description: NFT JET is the premier marketplace for digital assets and unique collectibles. Here, creators and collectors alike can trade, sell, and discover one-of-a-kind NFTs. NFT JET offers a seamless, secure, and user-friendly platform for managing your digital portfolio. Join our community to explore a vast universe of digital art, music, virtual real estate, and more, all while enjoying cutting-edge features and unparalleled support.
layout.keywords: NFT, marketplace, digital assets, collectibles, blockchain, digital art, crypto art, virtual real estate, decentralized, tokens, cryptocurrency, digital portfolio, NFT trading, NFT marketplace, NFT community, rare collectibles, unique NFTs, blockchain technology, digital ownership, crypto collectibles, NFT auction, NFT gallery, NFT creators, NFT collectors, tokenized assets
